data.title: previous nite line – Page 9 – WGGS TV
data.text:
It’s Ladies’ Night on Nite Line as Mary Sloan and Toni Suchka welcome Bridget Trammell of Take Heart Church, Author Logan Wolfram, and Stephanie Blassingame of Soteria CDC for an evening of music and ministry. […]

Nathan Bland welcomes Chad Burmeister of Littleton, Colorado to share how his relationship with Christ has changed after recovering from Covid-19. Rush Little plays the saxophone tonight on Nite Line. Chad Burmeister www.77pray.com chad@77pray.com www.livingabetterstory.org […]

Dave Walton welcomes Rev. Joseph Hopkins of Boiling Springs, South Carolina to discuss his upbringing and how he was led to Christ. This program features Christmas music from Pastor Seth Buckley of First Baptist Spartanburg. […]

Annie Broughton welcomes Kris Swiatocho, the co-founder of The Singles Network, to discuss her book, Intentional Relationships for Singles. Kris also shares advice for churches to minister to singles during the holiday season. Steve Dalton […]

Thursday, December 9, 2021: Mary Sloan and Toni Suchka welcome Narvis Hart and Jennifer Magaha of Alabaster House to discuss women in recovery. Aaron and Anna Bridges share how The Lord led them to become […]

Join Gwen and Wade Hall as they welcome their friends and family on a Christmas special of Nite Line. Hightop Mountain Harmony, Kiersen Cole, and Bailee Bishop sing on tonight’s program.

Benny Littlejohn welcomes Don Harkins, Dr. Marshall Williams, and Judy Edwards to share their testimonies and discuss their new book, Come Follow Me. Tonight’s guests also provide details of Textile Heritage Park and show pictures […]

Annie Broughton welcomes Benji Evans, the author of Back From Death’s Doorstep: A Story of Faith and Overcoming The Odds, to share how a near-death experience transformed his life. Dr. Gregg Jantz discusses his latest […]
